thread.title: Sasikala surrenders, clashes erupt in Tamil Nadu
thread.title_full: Sasikala surrenders, clashes erupt in Tamil Nadu

title: Sasikala surrenders, clashes erupt in Tamil Nadu
text: Sasikala surrenders, clashes erupt in Tamil Nadu IANS /Bengaluru   Share More > Vote Sasikala stopped on the way at the Jayalalithaa memorial on Marina beach to pay tribute to the late chief minister. AIADMK General Secretary V.K. Sasikala, held guilty for corruption, on Wednesday surrendered before a trial court at a prison here. Sasikala gave herself up at the Central Jail on the city's southern outskirts with her relatives Elavarasi and V.N. Sudhakaran after reaching from Chennai by road, officials said. Sasikala pays tribute at Jayalalithaa memorial on Chennai's Marina Beach before heading to Bengaluru to surrender https://t.co/ZZ7vAKfUKQ pic.twitter.com/wVh76Z5zUt
